sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const NotesItem = (props) => { const note = props.note; const deleteNote=(category)=>{ console.log(category) } return ( <>
{`#${note.id}`} {deleteNote(props.categoryName)}}>
{`Created on : ${note.createdDate}`}
{`${note.title}`}

{note.content}

{`Last Modified on : ${note.lastModifiedDate === null ? 'None' : note.lastModifiedDate}`}
) } export default NotesItem
